pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package implements functions, analogous to those from Data.List, to create and manipulate infinite lists: @data Stream a = Cons a (Stream a)@. It provides alternative definitions for those Prelude functions that make sense for such streams. Note that this package has (almost) nothing to do with the work on /Stream Fusion/ by Duncan Coutts, Roman Leshchinskiy, and Don Stewart.
